original_title: Sri Lanka bond yields steady, Rupee 319/325 at close
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s treasury bond yields closed steady on Thursday while rupee closed weaker, dealers said.
A 01.07.2025 bond closed at 30.60/31.00 percent on Thursday, down from 30.25/75 percent on Wednesday.
A 15.09.2027 bond closed at 27.80/28.10 percent, steady from 27.90/28.00 percent from Wednesday.
Sri Lanka rupee closed at 319/325 against the US dollar depreciating from 318/320 from a day earlier. (Colombo/ March23/2023)
